column2: al - funeral service for mary jo cooper
column6: 2015 at 11:00 am at radney-smith chapel with dr. wayne mc. daniel officiating. burial will be in evergreen cemetery in sylacauga
column9: 2015 at coosa valley medical center. she was preceded in death by her parents
column10: lester & shirley wagoner and son robert cooper. mrs. cooper loved clogging and the burger king gang. she loved the beach and the smokey mountains. she was a longtime member of first freewill baptist church. she is survived by husband
column13: larry e cooper and billy j cooper both of sylacauga
column15: lynn phurrough husband dean of alex city
column21: and several nieces and nephews. visitation will be sunday june 21
column22: 2015 from 5:00 pm until 8:00 pm. at radney-smith funeral home family members will serve as pallbearers. memorial messages may be sent to the family at www. radneysmith. com. radney-smith funeral home in sylacauga
